1.title: Hajimari no owari to owari no hajimari

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: A young man is summoned to a different reality. He begins a search for who did this and why.

2.title: Saikai no Majo

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Subaru discovers that his special magical ability is quite a pain.

3.title: Starting Life from Zero in Another World

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Subaru attempts to buy the insignia from Felt and return it to Satella before Elsa arrives at the loot house, but Satella arrives before the negotiations are complete, and Elsa still attacks them.

4.title: The Happy Roswaal Mansion Family

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: After being badly wounded by Elsa, Subaru somehow survived and awoke in the mansion of Margrave Mathers, in the Kingdom of Lugunica.

5.title: The Morning of Our Promise Is Still Distant

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Subaru now lives and works in Roswaal's mansion, working with Ram and Rem, and finally getting Emilia to agree to a date with him. But the day of their promised date never comes as Subaru keeps going back to the day he first awoke in the mansion. He's confused at the thought that he Returned by Death despite having no memory of experiencing anything deadly, but he's determined to repeat his previous actions up to the point of fulfilling his promise with Emilia.

6.title: The Sound of Chains

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Subaru's first day at the Roswaal mansion begins for the third time. The first time, he grew weak and died of unknown reasons in his sleep, and the second time, he was killed by an attacker. The sound of chains that he heard as he died the second time replays in his mind, waking him in a terrified, cold sweat. He has no idea what the killer is after, let alone who it is, so he makes a plan to leave the mansion on the fourth night and watch for the attack to happen.

7.title: Natsuki Subaru's Restart

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Standing before Subaru is someone he never expected. The truth of the attacker's identity leaves him bewildered, and he feels everything crumbling around him as he dies yet again. Then, for the fourth time, he awakes on his first day at the Roswaal mansion. This time, the night of the fourth day passes without incident, and Subaru is stunned as he greets the morning of the fifth day, but then the situation takes an unexpected turn.

8.title: I Cried, Cried My Lungs Out, and Stopped Crying

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Subaru's first day in Roswaal's mansion begins for the fifth time. Determined to save everyone this time, he makes it a point to keep his best smile on his face in order to earn the trust of the mansion's staff. But although he works his hardest to make them like him, his body begins to have trouble keeping up with his heart's intentions. Soon Emilia is unable to bear the sight of him struggling any longer and takes an unexpected action.

9.title: The Meaning of Courage

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: The scattered pieces of the puzzle finally come together, and Subaru realizes for certain that the shaman who cursed him is in the village at the foot of the mountains. He heads there with Ram and Rem and makes sure all the villagers touch him so that he can find out, with Beatrice's help, who cast the curse, but the truth he finds is not what he expected, and he finds himself rushing toward the village again.

10.title: Fanatical Methods Like a Demon

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Subaru risked his life to save the children from a pack of Ulgarm, but he was so powerfully cursed that there could be no saving him. Even Beatrice is unable to undo the complex web of curses on him, and says he'll grow weak and die within half a day. The only way he can survive is if the entire Ulgarm pack is defeated, but time is not on his side. Subaru is ready to give up when he learns that Rem has gone into the forest by herself.

11.title: Rem

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Knocked unconscious by Subaru's attack, Rem dreams of an event in her past that she and Ram would rather forget. After waking up, she tells Subaru that she's just committed the same sin again.

12.title: Return to the Royal Capital

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: By order of the council of elders, Wilhelm and Felis visit Roswaal's mansion as emissaries. Emilia and Subaru head to the imperial capital.

13.title: Self Proclaimed Knight, Natsuki Subaru

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: According to a new prophecy seen on the Dragon Stone, there are five priestesses with the potential to be the kingdom's next ruler.

14.title: The Sickness Called Despair

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

14.plot: Rejected by the one who meant more to him than anything, Subaru is still unable to recognize that he may have done something irreversible. He then finds out that some disturbing movement has been detected within Roswaal's domain.

15.title: The Outside of Madness

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

15.plot: Subaru reaches the Roswal mansion to find Rem dead in a horrendous way. Then he enters the mansion to see the way he is to pay for his mistakes.A new character or rather villain called Betelgeuse is introduced. Rem and subari fight for each other.

16.title: The Greed of a Pig

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

16.plot: Subaru and rem look for assistance to save Emilia and all who reside in Roswaal's domain.

17.title: Disgrace in the Extreme

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

17.plot: A mysterious figure appears before Subaru and his traveling companions. As the looming beast attacks with a deafening bellow amidst the darkness and fog, Rem determines that it will be too difficult to escape.

18.title: From Zero

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

18.plot: Subaru failed to protect everyone in the village after the witch cult killed everybody in there, then he was returned by death. Subaru tries to escape the land with Rem after giving up on everything until Rem starts speaking to him.

19.title: Battle Against the White Whale

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

19.plot: To save Emilia, Subaru approaches Crusch to negotiate the formation of an alliance. His terms are a bit difficult for Crusch to believe, but she can see that Subaru isn't lying.

20.title: Wilhelm van Astrea

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

20.plot: The battle against the white whale begins.

21.title: A Wager That Defies Despair

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

21.plot: Subaru and Rem lose all words at the sight unfolding above them. Just when it seemed they would soon have the White Whale cornered, the battle takes a turn that no one expected.

22.title: A Flash of Sloth

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

22.plot: The half of the mercenary army that had been blocking the road during the White Whale subjugation returns to join the main force. Subaru then leads the way into the forest of the Mathers domain, hoping to find and destroy the Witch's Cult before they can learn of the subjugating army's movements.

23.title: Nefarious Sloth

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

23.plot: Subaru and his companions head toward Roswaal's mansion to evacuate Emilia and all the others there, stopping at the nearby village on the way and beginning to evacuate its residents as well. However, the situation takes a turn that nobody expected.

24.title: The Self-Proclaimed Knight and the Most Valuable Knight

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

24.plot: Emilia tried to warn the villagers of Arlam that danger was coming and they should evacuate, but was not well-received. As she's pondering what more she can do, Wilhelm arrives at the mansion with a message.

25.title: That's All This Story Is About

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

25.plot: Subaru and Julius are fighting Betelgeuse by utilizing spirit arts to allow Julius to see through Subaru's eyes. This time, however, Subaru speaks his 'Return by Death' to have Betelgeuse come in contact with the spirit of Satella.

26.title: Memory Snow

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

26.plot: Subaru and friends defeat the Demon Beast Wolgarm, the source of the curse, and save the children of Irlam village. The characters finally get a moment of peace, and Subaru goes on a certain secret mission that he must not let anyone find out about. However, even though Subaru is wearing a disguise, Petra and other children of the village immediately figure out who he is. Now that his mission was exposed within five seconds of it starting, Subaru's "date" with Emilia could be ruined.

-1.title: Re: Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Memory Snow

episode of.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World (TV Series 2016– )

-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Suddenly, high school student Subaru Natsuki has been summoned to another world on the way back from the convenience store. With the biggest crisis of his life being summoned to another world, and with no sign of the one who summoned him, things become even worse when he is attacked. But when he is saved by a mysterious, silver-haired girl with a fairy cat, Subaru cooperates with her to return the favor. When they finally manage to get a clue, Subaru and the girl are attacked and killed by someone. Subaru then awakens in the place he was summoned and notices he gained the ability "Returns by Death" and has become a helpless boy that only has the ability to rewind time by dying. Beyond the despair, can he save the girl from the fate of death?
imdb.title: Re: Zero - Starting Life in Another World
plot: Shortly after being summoned to a new world, Subaru Natsuki and his new female companion are brutally murdered. But then he awakes to find himself in the same alley, with the same thugs, the same girl, and the day begins to repeat.

Suddenly, high school student Subaru Natsuki has been summoned to another world on the way back from the convenience store. With the biggest crisis of his life being summoned to another world, and with no sign of the one who summoned him, things become even worse when he is attacked. But when he is saved by a mysterious, silver-haired girl with a fairy cat, Subaru cooperates with her to return the favor. When they finally manage to get a clue, Subaru and the girl are attacked and killed by someone. Subaru then awakens in the place he was summoned and notices he gained the ability "Returns by Death" and has become a helpless boy that only has the ability to rewind time by dying. Beyond the despair, can he save the girl from the fate of death?::jCafe

Modern day teenage gamer, Natsuki Subaru, is thrust into a mysterious fantasy RPG styled world on his way home from a convenience store. As he searches for the heroine who he assumes summoned him he crosses paths with a silver haired half elf girl. She helps him, he returns the favor by helping her persue a stolen item of hers that leads to their untimely demises. . . Until Subaru wakes up again realizing he has the power to "Return by Death". This new discovery as well as his determination to help the half elf, opens his world to an unexpected turn of extremely unfortunate events.
